algorithm_technique: Topological sort-like approach by iteratively removing leaves.
problem_summary_simple: Find the roots of trees that have the minimum possible height.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively remove leaf nodes layer by layer until 1 or 2 nodes remain, which are the roots of Minimum Height Trees.
key_insights: The roots of Minimum Height Trees are the center(s) of the tree.
Leaves of a tree can be iteratively pruned to find the center.
The process stops when 1 or 2 nodes are left, as these will be the MHT roots.
